Posts.Content: Jessica111 wrote: hi I am 31 years old, I have 1 child he is 9. The area has stayed about the same size but the redness fluctuates Sometimes it's really bad sometimes it's lighter. I went to my gyno he thought maybe it was fungal and gave me a cream, the first day I put it on the redness was completely gone but now it's back Tuesday will be a week that I've been to the dr. It's still there. I'm very concerned it keeps me up at night. I suffer from fibromyalgia, anxiety and depression and I'm having a very difficult time with this . My husband isn't very understanding and thinks I'm over reacting. I also have a huge polyp in my Uterus which with be removed in September along with a dnc.
